UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Investigating the effects of positive charge and hydrophobicity on the cell selectivity, mechanism of action and anti-inflammatory activity of a Trp-rich antimicrobial peptide indolicidin
Literature.Author: Nan YH, Park KH, Park Y, Jeon YJ, Kim Y, Park IS, Hahm KS, Shin SY

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli KCTC 1682(MIC=5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa KCTC 1637(MIC=20µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium KCTC 1926(MIC=10µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis KCTC 3068(MIC=10µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis KCTC 1917(MIC=5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus KCTC 1621(MIC=10µg/ml)
